display_long_description:
This game is a challenge for all VR gamers who love quick reflexes and quirky fun. For VR gamers who are sharp in both reflexes and wit... the world is waiting for you!

# Prove You’re the Best!
Your goal is to catch all of the falling blue sticks and rise to the top!
But be careful! Some unexpected surprises, like knives, food, rubber chickens, and even dynamite may fall as well! Let's catch them all!
The challenge gets harder and faster as you go! Can you handle the chaos and increase your score?
[media]

# Remember Your Training
Your coach has been training you for this moment your entire life! He’s there to support and encourage you to new heights. But that’s not all he can do! Your coach can take care of some of the more dangerous falling items. Throw the dangerous items to him and see how he reacts!
[media]

# Not Your Average Stick-Catching Game!
This isn’t just another reflex test! Stick Catcher is a VR experience like no other. With dynamic gameplay and quirky falling objects, every moment is packed with excitement. Whether you’re a VR pro or new to the game...Stick Catcher will push you to your limits!
[media]
